Pre-Game Insights: Argentina is the reigning Copa America champions and heavy favorites to win the tournament again.
Canada is making their debut in the Copa America and will face Argentina in the opening match on June 20.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is the first of the Copa America 2024 and will be held at Mercedes-Benz Stadium in Atlanta, Georgia.
Canada's star player Alphonso Davies has a strong record against Lionel Messi, aiming to extend his winning streak.
